name: Alteil Horizons (Canceled)
blurb: Online turn-based tactics card game with a battle grid by creators of Star Ocean & Valkyrie Profile. Artists from Zelda & Final Fantasy

rewards.reward: No Reward
---Tip Jar--- A vote of confidence can sometimes be worth all the money in the world. Thank you from the entire Apocoplay (US) and Coreedge (JP) staff.

--BONUS REWARD-- Now, all backers at the $50 level and above get 50 slots for decks when deckbuilding instead of 20 with their Premium Accounts. (--This is just a placeholder to announce the bonus, not a real reward level--)

---Alteil Backer--- \r\nAt $10, we\u2019ll add your name to the credits as an official Kickstarter Backer, as well as invitations to any pre-launch events or betas. You\u2019ll even get an exclusive Avatar for backers only!

---Honored Iczer--- You\u2019ll get everything from the above Alteil Backer ($10) Level, plus we\u2019ll give you all four starter decks (30 cards each) at level 1 to give you a head start! You\u2019ll also get one complete Horizons pre-built deck of your choice (30 cards, $10-$15 value), as well as 1000 extra Gran ($10 value) to spend on whatever you want. Even better, you\u2019ll get the following exclusive cards to play with:  \u2022 1 Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 1 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 1 TBA Super Mystery Artist Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version)

---Dragon Rider---
You get everything from the above Honored Iczer Level, plus a whole lot more! Here's the complete list: • Start with all 4 starter decks at level 1. • Three Alteil Horizons pre-built decks of your choice (30-45$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). • 1000 Gran (10$ value). •
3 (full playset) Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) •
1 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) •
1 Mystery Artist Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) • 1 Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive • 1 Digital Art Book of your choice: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen or Falkow •
Kickstarter Exclusive Avatar Invitation to any pre-launch betas or events. • Name in the Credits as a Kickstarter Backer.

---Master of the Four Gods---\r\nStart with all 4 starter decks at level 1. \u2022 Four Alteil Horizons pre-built decks of your choice (40-60$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). \u2022 2500 Gran (25$ value). \u2022 3 Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 3 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 3 Mystery Artist Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 1 Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 Black Mantle Jacques Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 year Premium Account Status \u2022 1 Digital Art Book of your choice: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen or Falkow \u2022 Digital Download of Alteil Horizons Soundtrack \u2022 Kickstarter Exclusive Avatar \u2022 Invitation to any pre-launch betas or events. \u2022 Name in the Credits as a Kickstarter Backer.

---Redeemer of the Cursed---\r\nStart with all 4 starter decks at level 1. \u2022 Four Alteil Horizons pre-built decks of your choice (40-60$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). \u2022 5000 Gran (50$ value) \u2022 3 Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022  3 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 3 Mystery Artist Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version)  \u2022\r\n1 Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 Black Mantle Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 Miko Princess Hirume Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 year Premium Account Status \u2022 1 copy of this year's Slave of Batora (4 unique cards) before general release, includes Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert \u2022 All 4 Digital Art Books: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen and Falkow \u2022 Digital Download of Alteil Horizons Soundtrack \u2022 Kickstarter Exclusive Avatar \u2022 Invitation to any pre-launch betas or events. \u2022 Name in the Credits as a Kickstarter Backer.

---Mercenary Lord---

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! ---Lord of Sun and Moon (at only 95$)---\r\nStart with all 4 starter decks at level 1. \u2022 Four Alteil Horizons pre-built decks of your choice (40-60$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). \u2022 12000 Gran (120$ value) \u2022 3 Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022  3 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 3 Mystery Artist Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version)  \u2022 3 Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 3 Black Mantle Kickstarter Exclusive\r\n\u2022 3 Miko Princess Hirume Kickstarter Exclusive. \u2022 1 June Bride Legendary Heroine Catria Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 Premium Account Status For Life \u2022 3 copy Slave of Batora II Set before general release, including Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert \u2022 5 Three-Star Triple-Changer cards with no expiration date \u2022 All 4 Digital Art Books: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen and Falkow \u2022 Digital Download of Alteil Horizons Soundtrack \u2022 Kickstarter Exclusive Avatar \u2022 Invitation to any pre-launch betas or events. \u2022 Name in the Credits as a Kickstarter Backer.

---Lord of Sun and Moon---
Start with all 4 starter decks at level 1. - Four Alteil Horizons pre-built decks of your choice (40-60$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). • 12000 Gran (120$ value) • 3 Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) • 3 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) • 3 Mystery Artist Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) • 3 Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive • 3 Black Mantle Kickstarter Exclusive • 3 Miko Princess Hirume Kickstarter Exclusive. 
• 1 June Bride Legendary Heroine Catria Kickstarter Exclusive • Premium Account Status For Life • 3 copy Slave of Batora II Set before general release, including Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert • 5 Three-Star Triple-Changer cards with no expiration date
• All 4 Digital Art Books: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen and Falkow • Digital Download of Alteil Horizons Soundtrack • Kickstarter Exclusive Avatar
• Invitation to any pre-launch betas or events. • Name in the Credits as a Kickstarter Backer.

---Community Leader---\r\n\u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon level \u2022 Ten other accounts of your choice get 1000 Gran ($100 value), one 3-Star Triple Change card, and one copy of Obsidian Dragon (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 Give Community Tournament Prizes as if you were one tier higher.\r\n\u2022 When a guild you are part of earns point cards from a non-community tournament guild event, all guild members get +5 Point Cards (Note, for multiple leaders in one guild it's +1 Point Card per additional leader, max of 10). \u2022 If you do not yet have one, your guild gains it\u2019s own private sub-forum \u2022 You get a say in the creation of the Community Tournament System, User created single player content, and any other community based game feature in development \u2022 Unique Avatar Item to Leaders

---Keeper of the Archive---\r\n\u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon level \u2022 1 Copy of every non-exclusive alternate art card (seasonal card - about 90 total) card in the game. \u2022 Every non-exclusive alternate art (seasonal card) released in 2014. \u2022 Every non-exclusive Avatar in the game \u2022 Two 4-Star Triple Change cards and one 5-Star Triple Change cards.

---Lone Hero of Lavato---\r\n\u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon level \u2022 Holy Aura - Batora skips 1st turn for life \u2022 One copy of each card of the first Altiel: Horizons Set (60 cards total) \u2022 Personalized Alteil lessons from one of our top players.

---Emperor of Lavato---\r\n- Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon level \u2022 1 Copy of every non-exclusive alternate art (seasonal) card in the game (about 90 cards total). \u2022 Every non-exclusive alternate art (seasonal card) released in 2014. \u2022 Every non-exclusive Avatar in the game \u2022 Two 4-Star Triple Change cards and one 5-Star Triple Change cards. \u2022 Holy Aura - Batora skips 1st turn for life \u2022 Three copies of each card of the first Altiel: Horizons Set (60 cards total)

---Grand Community Leader---\r\n\u2022 Includes everything from the Community Leader and Emperor of Lavato tiers. (only one set of the Lord of Sun and Moon level) \u2022 Two additional copies of Obsidian Dragon and one additional 3 star Triple Change Card to each of the 10 accounts receiving gifts from the Community Leader tier.

---Epic Hero---\r\n\u2022 Everything from the Grand Community Leader level \u2022 Personal lessons from top Alteil player Worthing and Alteil game designer Logress\r\n\u2022 1 of each of the top 100 Soul Cards in the game, by use in high RP decks

---Better With Ninjas---
• Includes everything from the Lone Hero of Lavato level
• Commissioned alternate card art from Christopher Hastings (Dr. McNinja)
• Three copies of the commissioned card on three accounts of your choice (3 for each account)
• A large PDF of the commissioned image.
• You may add any $500 or higher level tier without a quantity limit, but you only get the Lone Hero of Lavato equivalent rewards once.

---Zombie King---\r\n\u2022 Includes everything from the Emperor of Lavato level \u2022 Three copies of every Undead card in the game (90+ total cards). \u2022 Commissioned card art from Arthur Suydam of Marvel Zombies fame. \u2022 Three copies of the commissioned card on three accounts of your choice (3 for each account) \u2022 A large PDF of the commissioned image.

---Alteil Game Designer---\r\n\u2022 Everything from the Epic Hero level. \u2022 Work with the Apocoplay team and one of the japanese artists to create a new card, new art, new abilities, all directed by you, that will become a permanent part of the game. \u2022 Custom Avatar by GGG

---Monster King---  Includes everything from the Emperor of Lavato level \u2022 Three copies of every Monster card in the game (180+ total cards). \u2022 Commissioned card from Legendary Magic Artist Nils Hamm. Three copies of the commissioned card on three accounts of your choice (3 for each account) - A large PDF of the commissioned image.

---Fifth God of Lavato---
• Everything from the Epic Hero level.
• Work with the Apocoplay team and Japanese artists to create a new EX Set, 4 pieces of new art, new abilities, all directed by you, that will become a permanent part of the game. • Work with our lead writer to create a story for this new EX: set that will become a permanent part of the game’s storyline. • One of the new EX cards will be based on your appearance, or the appearance of a friend.
-Custom Avatar by GGG
